summary: Frontend Valentine page UI was added with a prompt and a â€œYesâ€ reveal state, but the diff evidence is incomplete/truncated for the evasive â€œNoâ€ behavior and the required static image asset is not shown as added. Several unrequested/auth-related and backend files were introduced, conflicting with the frontend-only/non-goals constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement two on-screen options: â€œYesâ€ and â€œNoâ€. The â€œNoâ€ option must move away when the user attempts to interact with it so that it is effectively not clickable.
missing_requirements.reason: The added App.tsx shows state and a hover handler for a moving No button, but the diff is truncated before any â€œNoâ€ control is actually shown, and there is no evidence of pointer-enter + touchstart/pointerdown handlers, nor evidence that the No button remains on-screen.

missing_requirements.requirement: When the user clicks/taps â€œYesâ€, replace the prompt/options with a reveal state that displays a meme image and the exact message: â€œThatâ€™s the best decision youâ€™ve ever madeâ¤ï¸â€.
missing_requirements.reason: The reveal state exists, but the displayed message uses straight apostrophes ("That's" / "you've") rather than the exact curly-apostrophe text specified in the requirement, so the â€˜exact messageâ€™ AC is not evidenced as met.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated meme image to the app as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and render it in the â€œYesâ€ reveal state.
missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx references the image path, but the diff summary does not show the required file being added under frontend/public/assets/generated/valentine-meme.dim_1200x1200.png, so existence and static-asset loading cannot be confirmed from the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend canister code despite the request being frontend-only and â€˜Do not add new backend functionality unless requiredâ€™.
hallucinated_features.reason: A new backend file was added even though no backend changes were required for this feature.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication scaffolding/hooks and provider wiring were added, despite being a stated non-goal (no Internet Identity authentication).
hallucinated_features.reason: New hooks and provider usage for Internet Identity were introduced even though the BuildRequest explicitly excludes it.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query client/provider setup added even though no backend queries are needed for a frontend-only single page.
hallucinated_features.reason: The app is wrapped with QueryClientProvider and new actor/query hooks were added without being requested.
Not requested and could be considered an additional app section beyond the single prompt and reveal states.
